titles.title: Encouraging municipalities to adopt and enforce effective protections against dog bites, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock and Horticulture .

bill.summary: 9/14/2006--Introduced. Calls for: (1) each community to address the issues of dog bites and dangerous dogs; and (2) municipalities to consider, and enact model programs and legislation addressing, the factors contributing to a dog's temperament, including whether a dog is continuously chained and whether a male dog has been neutered.
